sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.JSONParser</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>JSON Parser that does not use javascript's eval() function. Safe and secure. It does not check for the validity of the JSON string, but shouldn't create any catastrophic errors.</description> <name>JSONParser</name> <script><![CDATA[/** * Parses JSON string to javascript object * * tom.dilatush@service-now.com */
var JSONParser = Class.create();
JSONParser.prototype = { parse: function (source) { if (JSUtil.nil(source)) return;
return new SNC.JSONParse().decode(source); } };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>juell.solaegui</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2010-06-15 19:03:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3ceff5790a0a0bae00e49c7f3c7ced38</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>JSONParser</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3ceff5790a0a0bae00e49c7f3c7ced38</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>tom.dilatush</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2012-04-24 20:46:43</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>305</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
